name: Yatzy Extreme
description:
Yatzy Extreme is the deluxe edition of Yahtzee.

The objective of the game is to score points by rolling five dice to make certain combinations.

You could play Solo or against the Computer or against a Friend on the same device.

Enjoy 25 different sets of Dice to customize your experience.

NB: we have many other great games in the App Store.
